results.title: Carob Extract (Ceratonia siliqua L.): Effects on Dyslipidemia and Obesity in a High-Fat Diet-Fed Rat Model
results.text_hl: A study confirmed the anti-dyslipidemic, anti-@<m>DISEASE_Obesity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, and hepatoprotective potential of carob pulp alone or in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@ diet-fed @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin improves lysosome function via enhancing lysosome biogenesis in endothelial cells.
results.text_hl: Collectively, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment improves lysosome function via enhancing lysosome biogenesis and its autophagic turnover, which may be an important mechanism to suppress @GENE_NLRP3 @GENE_216799 @@@Nlrp3@@@ inflammasome activation and prevents endothelial hyperpermeability in @<m>DISEASE_Obesity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Wang YT, Koka S, Zhang Y, Hussain T, Li X. Simvastatin improves lysosome function via enhancing lysosome biogenesis in endothelial cells. Front Biosci (Landmark Ed). 2020 Jan 1;25(2):283-298. PMID: 31585890

results.title: Synergistic effects of magnesium ions and simvastatin on attenuation of high-fat diet-induced bone loss
results.text_hl: Therefore, we formulated the notion that the combined supplementation of Mg2+ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (SIM) at a lower dose might synergistically reduce @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ synthesis, replenish the Mg2+ scarcity in @<m>DISEASE_Obesity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, and bypass the side-effects from statins treatment alone.
